svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 31 2021

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 31, 2021" date: "2021-12-30"
Eth News and Links
Mainnet execution layer
‚Ä¢ Akula client preview, written in Rust, can currently run alongside Erigon to sync, full validation
from genesis in < 24 hours, enterprise-friendly Apache 2.0 license
‚Ä¢ History of account abstraction and EIP4337 proposal
‚Ä¢ Archive node running on Raspberry Pi 4, using Erigon. Also running a Nimbus staking client on same
device
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIP4610 : ERC721 Delegator Extension
Proof of Stake consensus layer
‚Ä¢ Dankrad‚Äôs proposed new sharding design : adds a transaction type with sharded data as call data,
allows tight integration between Layer 1 & 2, higher computing requirements for block builders
‚Ä¢ Consensus specs v1.1.8 : sets Bellatrix as upgrade name & new test vectors
‚Ä¢ StakeWise Metro : allows external node operators
Layer2
‚Ä¢ Huobi Global adds ETH deposit and withdrawals on Arbitrum
‚Ä¢ Argent zksync wallet integrates ZigZag exchange, flat $1 trade & network fee
‚Ä¢ #L222 is the ‚Äúofficial‚Äù hashtag for Layer 2 adoption in 2022 ü¶Ü
‚Ä¢ Proposal for efficient zk-EVM arithmetization from ConsenSys Applied R&D
This newsletter is made possible thanks to NEAR !
NEAR has launched Simple Nightshade sharding to pave the way for greater throughput!
Simple Nightshade has four different state shards.¬† For devs and users, it‚Äôs important to note that
NEAR treats cross-contract calls the same regardless of whether two contracts are on the same shard.
Early in 2022, phase 1 will introduce chunk-only producers , who only validate one shard and allow for
further decentralization via more validators.¬† Full Nightshade is scheduled for q3 2022 and will
feature full sharding of both state and processing.
Learn more about what‚Äôs going on in NEAR in the community-driven NEARweek newsletter.
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Solidity Language Server explainer : every IDE with Language Server support can support Solidity out
of the box
‚Ä¢ Foundry forge run command, runs single file contract as a script, supports cheatcodes, mainnet
forking and debug logs
‚Ä¢ Fuzzing complex projects with Echidna, example uses Sushi's BentoBox
‚Ä¢ Advanced optimization tips for Yul & Solidity
‚Ä¢ OpenZeppelin Nile v0.3.0 (StarkNet projects in Cairo): deploy accounts and send transactions,
mainnet & G√∂rli compatible
‚Ä¢ ShortString : immutable bytes32 can be used for short strings (Solidity doesn‚Äôt support immutable
strings), convert back to string in a view function
‚Ä¢ erc721-drop : NFT drop template with constants for supply cap and price, uses Solmate, Solidity test
with Foundry, AGPL v3 license
‚Ä¢ Captcha-protected NFT distribution using an off-chain signing service
‚Ä¢ merkle-airdrop-starter : scripts, contracts and frontend, for an airdrop
Security
‚Ä¢ Polygon lack of balance/allowance check postmortem , 9 billion MATIC was at risk, 800k MATIC stolen,
$2.2 million + 500k MATIC bounties paid
‚Ä¢ Bent Finance postmortem , rogue dev upgraded to contract with hard coded balances, funds returned
Ecosystem
‚Ä¢ Fishing for an ECDSA nonce reuse bot with Ether as bait
‚Ä¢ Flashbots MEV Roast & research workshop videos
‚Ä¢ Tutela : check anonymity of an address on Tornado Cash
Enterprise
‚Ä¢ Gamestop NFT marketplace opens applications for creators
Application layer
‚Ä¢ Aelin deal coordination protocol live on Optimism
‚Ä¢ Real World Asset market live, built on Centrifuge and AAVE
‚Ä¢ Sperax algorithmic USD stablecoin beta live on Arbitrum
‚Ä¢ Tokenized Time : buy, sell and trade time, proof of concept
‚Ä¢ briq composable blocks to construct NFTs, alpha on StarkNet
‚Ä¢ Cryptopunks decentralized market beta, MIT license
‚Ä¢ Movement : 3D browser based gallery for an address/ENS
‚Ä¢ Gnosis Guild‚Äôs Zodiac bridge module allows a DAO on one network to control assets and interact with
systems on another network
‚Ä¢ Paris Hilton adds ENS to Twitter
Job Listings
‚Ä¢ Certora seeks SR SW Eng , Security Res , Security Eng & Community Manager
‚Ä¢ The VAC team at Status.im are looking for a blockchain engineer
‚Ä¢ Geth team is looking for a Senior Technical Writer
‚Ä¢ Kwenta seeks Frontend Engineer , Solidity Engineer & Marketing Lead
‚Ä¢ Are you a p2p networking whiz? EF research hiring Networking Engineer
‚Ä¢ Textile is hiring! Blockchain Eng , Backend Eng , and Partner Manager
Reach developers experienced with Ethereum.¬† $600 for four issues (~75 character limit), payable in
ETH/DAI/USDC to abcoathup.eth on mainnet, Arbitrum or Optimism.¬† Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ Be mindful of low effort airdrops : OpenDAO ‚Äôs SOS based on amount spent on OpenSea; Gas DAO ‚Äôs GAS
based on gas spent; visualizations of SOS airdrop claim and analysis of top 25 recipients, 68% dumped
their tokens
‚Ä¢ Mirrortable : concept of a capitalization table mirrored on-chain to streamline angel investing
‚Ä¢ Proposal to port Aave v3 to StarkNet Layer 2
‚Ä¢ Bored Ape token expected Q1 2022 (beware of scams)
‚Ä¢ South Korean centralized exchanges to block transfers to non-verified addresses
‚Ä¢ Bank of Mexico plans for CBDC by 2024
General
‚Ä¢ Web3 is self certifying : authorship of content is proven with cryptographic user identifiers &
content-addressed data
‚Ä¢ LastPass warns some users of unusual login attempt, due to credential stuffing, some alerts
triggered in error
‚Ä¢ T-mobile notifies small number of customers their SIMs were swapped
‚Ä¢ Halo2-franchise-proof : experimental port of Vocdoni voting anonymizer zk circuit to the ZCash Halo2
proving system which doesn‚Äôt have a trusted setup
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @evan_van_ness and
@abcoathup to get most of the week‚Äôs news in real time.
Permalink for this week‚Äôs issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-december-31-2021
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note (new/changes in bold ) :
‚Ä¢ Jan 13 ‚Äì MEV in 2021 (virtual)
‚Ä¢ Jan 14-16 ‚Äì ETHGlobal ‚Äôs NFTHack (virtual)
‚Ä¢ Feb 15 - Apr 5 ‚Äì Cryptocurrency Class (virtual)
‚Ä¢ Feb 17 ‚Äì Schelling Point (Denver)
‚Ä¢ Feb 18-20 ‚Äì ETHDenver
‚Ä¢ Mar 14-17 ‚Äì Eth Rio
‚Ä¢ Mar 29-31 ‚Äì ETHDubai
‚Ä¢ Apr 22-24 ‚Äì ETHAmsterdam
‚Ä¢ May 3-8 ‚Äì spaghettETH (Milan)
‚Ä¢ Jun 10-12 ‚Äì ETHPrague
‚Ä¢ Jun 21-23 ‚Äì NFT.NYC
‚Ä¢ Jun 24-26¬† ‚Äì ETHNewYork
‚Ä¢ Jul 19-21 ‚Äì EthCC 5 (Paris)
‚Ä¢ Aug 19-21 ‚Äì ETHMexicoCity
‚Ä¢ Nov 4-6 ‚Äì ETHSanFrancisco
‚Ä¢ Dec 2-4 ‚Äì ETHTaipei
